BESA.Kernel.Agent

Class GuardBESA

  • java.lang.Object
    • BESA.Kernel.Agent.GuardBESA
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    GuardServiceProviderRequest, GuardServiceProviderSuscribe, InitStageProtocolBESA, MultiGuardBESA, PeriodicGuardBESA, TimeOutGuardBESA

    public abstract class GuardBESA
extends java.lang.Object
    This class represents a guard of an agent. A guard is made up of an evaluation function, that indicates if the guard is or not activated, and a function that executes in the associated behavior that makes some of the 3 following operations: 1. Change the internal agent state. 2. Modify the environment. 3. Send events to another agents.
    Since:
    JDK1.0

      • finalize

        public void finalize()
        Eliminates initial binds of the guard.
        Overrides:
        finalize in class java.lang.Object

      • funcEvalBool

        public boolean funcEvalBool(StateBESA objEvalBool)
        Evaluates if the guard must be or not executed by the behaviors.

        By default the function returns true, the guard is executed with the occurrence of the event, if not desire this then is due to rewrite this function in the subclass.
        Parameters:
        objEvalBool - Internal agent state, used to verify the execution condition.
        Returns:
        true if the guard must be executed; false otherwise.

      • funcExecGuard

        public abstract void funcExecGuard(EventBESA event)
        Conduct to execute when the guard initializes. The guard is executed within a behavior to which it has been associated.

        The conduct depends on the data associated to the event.

        The conduct depends and/or can modify the agent state.
        Parameters:
        event - Received event, contains the related data.

      • getPort

        public PortBESA getPort()
        Returns the port associated to the guard .
        Returns:
        Port associated to the guard.

      • getAgent

        public AgentBESA getAgent()
        Returns the associated agent to the guard.
        Returns:
        Associated agent.
